text: puokke ban niyeay tha puok yeung minban kbat kechchasanyea robsa anak daoy kar chreusareusa robsa puok yeung phtal laey . kabonde puok yeung trauv ban ke bangkham aoy ttuolobantouk muoy yeangothngonthngor pi kar bramoul kruengoalongkear robsa krom( hvie r aon) . kraoyomk puok yeung ka ban baoh vea( chaul tow knong phleung tam karnenam robsa sa mi ri) . banteab mk sa mi ri kaban thveu dauchnaoh der
